description.value:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Staff Acrobat}
Prerequisites Staff Acrobat Dedication
Requirements You are wielding your staff.

Make a Strike with your staff. As long as you don't critically fail, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty to its DC against @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} attempts until the start of your next turn.
